sense.def:
To shorten an event
pomeni storiti nekaj, da določen dogodek ne traja toliko časa, kot bi sicer.

seg.quote: The colonel had a plan to shorten the war.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shortens
ali kadar nekdo
shortens an object
, tisti predmet postane krajši ali ga nekdo skrajša.

seg.quote: The back muscles contract and shorten as your leg lifts.
She wondered if she could have the sleeves shortened.
